title: Payment Failed
description: Fired when a one-time or standalone payment attempt fails.

paymentId.description: Unique identifier for the payment attempt.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the failed payment.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method used in the failed attempt.

orderId.description: The unique identifier of the associated order.

invoiceId.description: The unique identifier of the associated invoice.

retryCount.description: The number of payment retry attempts made.
